Text:
http://uk.pc.ign.com/objects/003/003944.html

-Slow download, but I'll be seeding for a while
-Game works fine, thx and good job ALightRain
-Windows 7 users, the color will probably be messed up in-game, so you'll either need to kill explorer.exe or create a batch file to auto-kill it for the game and auto-restart when you end the game. There are good step-by-step instructions here ----> http://ashraful-islam.hubpages.com/hub/Ressolve-color-issues-with-some-older-games-in-windows-7
